content: I double-checked the syllabus that the department had posted, and it's accurate: https://csmasters.uchicago.edu/page/mpcs-52553-web-development Is there anything not covered on that page that would be helpful for me to elaborate upon?  If so just let me know.

I'll probably figure it out from your account name, but later on I'll post the accounts I couldn't figure out.  (GitHub already has a way for me to know all of the account names based on the list of forks)
